content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, and I can help schedule a service for you today. May I have your name, please?
Thank you, Margaret! Can you please provide your address so we can confirm we can send a technician to your location?
Thank you! Can you please describe the electrical issue you're experiencing?
My lights keep flickering and there’s a buzzing noise from the panel. How much will it cost to fix?
Thank you for sharing those details, Margaret. I will get a price estimate for you right now.
I’m sorry, I’m having trouble retrieving a price estimate at the moment. Let me get a member of our team to assist you directly.
reason: Agent unable to provide price estimate due to system error.

content: Hi Margaret, this is Sarah from XYZ Home Services. I’m sorry for the delay. To provide an accurate estimate, we'll need a technician to assess the issue onsite, as electrical panel problems can vary. There is a standard diagnostic fee of $89, and we'll share a full quote after the inspection. Would you like to schedule an appointment for our next available slot?
Yes, please book me as soon as possible. This is urgent.

Thank you, Margaret. I’ve set you up for the first available appointment slot today. Our technician will call ahead before arriving. If you need to make any changes, reply to this message. We look forward to helping you soon!
reason: Operator scheduled the appointment directly after agent failed to provide price estimate.
